page.title: 12HOME LIFE
page.content: {A typical weekday in the life of Diane {Martin,aged 11,of Tythehouse Farm. "My cat wakes me up at 7.15,and I get dressed and downstairs at about 8 a.m. After breakfast my mother takes my brother Scott and I to school,and our neighbour Samantha.When I get to school there is a short time to play with my best friend Katy.We start our work with Silent Reading followed by various subjects like Mathematics and writing.No-one at school goes home at lunchtime,and we all play at break, games like Kidnapping and horses.In the afternoon we might have Art and writing,and we can finish with a quiz. Samantha's mother collects us and when we get home,Mum is at the door to greet us.We change into our old clothes and help Mum and Dad,and after tea we usually stay in and watch T.V. or read or play."
